Trade/Device Name(s): On Call® Home Drug Test for Marijuana
On Call® Home Drug Test for Marijuana and Cocaine
Regulation Name(s): Marijuana, or Marijuana and Cocaine test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for On Call Home Drug Test for Marijuana and On Call Home Drug Test for Marijuana & Cocaine, rapid lateral flow immunoassays for qualitative detection of drugs of abuse in urine.
Indications for Use Summary: Over-the-counter rapid screening tests for preliminary detection of Marijuana (THC) and Cocaine (COC) and their metabolites in urine; intended as the first step in a two-step process with laboratory confirmation for positive results.
